          <title>
            <string language="en">Cool box</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kühler Kasten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cadre frais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caixa fresca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Casella fredda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δροσερό κιβώτιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rectángulo fresco</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a cool box made of plastic foam that is used to store food and drinks.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cool box</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drink</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastic foam</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen kühlen Kasten, der 
vom Schaumkunststoff gebildet wird, der benutzt wird, um Nahrung zu 
speichern und trinkt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un cadre frais fait en 
mousse en plastique qui est employée pour enregistrer la nourriture 
et boit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma caixa fresca feita 
da espuma plástica que é usada armazenar o alimento e bebe-a.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una casella fredda 
fatta di gomma piuma di plastica che è usata per memorizzare 
l'alimento e beve.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δροσερό κιβώτιο φιαγμένο
από πλαστικό αφρό που χρησιμοποιείται για να καταχωρήσει τα 
τρόφιμα και τα ποτά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un rectángulo fresco 
hecho de la espuma plástica que se utiliza para salvar el alimento y 
bebe.</string>
          </description>
